clause_text: Sr. No.: 1 | Qty. of LPG in Kg.s: 5000 | Total area requirement for storage shed (sq. m.): 55 | Safety Clearance required all around in Meters: 6.0 | Preferable size of land with parking area of 6 m. wide on front side: 21 m. x 26 m.
